text: Nabiyow ama koros diinit derre cabtam kol tembe tet tekkek, toysa Baaxok addal edde gacta arac gurrussaah hinnay siixiy (magaar) Qaran edde tawqe gurrussaah, tokkel atu Nabii kinnitom tascasse asta keenih bahtam duddek, toysa toh keenih ab Yalli faxinnay isin elle tanin tirtol ken gaaboysak yeneeh yaamineenim keenil Bicisak yen, toysa Nabiyow wohut Yalli faxem igma marih num makkinaay Rookat isi Nafsi maqidin
